product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies Watertight Case 0.5 - Overstock
long_description: Providing waterproof protection for important items such as credit cards or flash drives, the small yet durable Ultimate Survival Technologies Watertight Case 0.5 is easy to pack on every adventure. Transparent polycarbonate material is lightweight and shatterproof. O-ring seal ensures case stays watertight; includes a lanyard and carabiner for easy transportation. Case measures 3.25 x 2.13 x .75 in. Please note the Ultimate Survival Technologies Watertight Case 0.5 is not meant to be submerged under water. Overstock.
short_description: Providing waterproof protection for important items such as credit cards or flash drives, the small yet durable Ultimate Survival Technologies Watertight Case 0.5 is easy to pack on every adventure.
